abstract: Insurance usually covers damage to your home or car from falling objects, including satellites.
snippet: Insurance usually covers damage to your home or car from falling objects, including satellites.
lead_paragraph: Just last month, an old NASA satellite plummeted to Earth and disintegrated. Now space buffs are keeping an eye on the retired German scientific satellite ROSAT, which is expected to crash and burn sometime this weekend.

headline.main: Damage From Falling Satellites? Insurance Will Cover It
